title: TV GUIDE: Spend your Tuesday evening with an A-list crowd
text:
TV GUIDE: Spend your Tuesday evening with an A-list crowd

Cape Town – Spend you Tuesday evening with the A-list crowd.

From Renée Zellweger, and Forest Whitaker, to two rocking local bands – here are our 3 top picks to tune in to.

The Graham Norton Show

19:59 - BBC Brit (DStv 120)

Renée Zellweger talks about being Judy, Lenny Henry says he accepted his knighthood because of his mum, Louis Theroux reveals his wife wasn’t overly impressed with his initial literary attempt, Andrew Ridgeley praises his best friend George Michael and Elbow perform live in the studio.

Godfather of Harlem

21:30 - 1Magic (DStv 103)

Forest Whitaker plays infamous crime boss Bumpy Johnson. After a decade in prison he returns to Harlem to find the neighbourhood in shambles and the Italian mafia controlling the streets. Based on a true story.

Tertjag Die Melktert Kommissie & Klopjag Live

Showmax

Two Afrikaans bands you haven’t heard from in a while, Die Melktert Kommissie and Klopjag, join forces for a two-shows-only reunion.
description: From Renée Zellweger and Forest Whitaker, to two rocking local bands – here are our 3 top picks to tune in to.
